conversations.content: Update the monitoring agent alert threshold

tool_call: agentManager_updateAgent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732133300000_v4w5x6y7z", "workspaceId": "ws_1732133300000_y6z7a8b9c", "sessionDescription": "Updating thresholds", "sessionMemory": "Monitoring agent previously configured with 85% CPU threshold. Recent incident with CPU spikes required adjustment. System performance acceptable after last optimization pass.", "toolContext": "Adjusting alert sensitivity thresholds to reduce false positives from baseline CPU spikes while maintaining security boundary for critical alerts", "primaryGoal": "Optimize monitoring", "subgoal": "Update alert threshold to improve detection"}, "id": "agent_1732000000000_m1o2n3i4t", "description": "Monitors system health and alerts when CPU exceeds 80% or memory exceeds 90%"}
